Attributes.description: An integrative treatment of air transport management including: demand analysis, sales and marketing, globalization trends, aircraft selection and fleet planning; airport economics and management.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of COMM 295, ECON 201, ECON 301.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 10:00, End Time: 11:30, Building: Henry, Room: Angus
